attributes.description: A top contender for the best value for money double cab on the market today, this 2022 Mahindra S6 Double cab offers proven dependability combined with added luxury and convenience features. As close to new as it gets, this 2022 is specced with front fog lights, side steps, roll bar, steel wheels, electric windows and mirrors, a durable cloth interior, an automatic gearbox, adjustable headlamps, air conditioning and a factory radio system!
